name: What a colorful game!
description:
Your goal is to bring back their colors to the two rainbow doors to save the world!

you can move with the arrows . Good luck!

this game has been made in about 4 hours by Nathan Tazi (coding + gameDesign + levelDesign),Gabriel Thetiot(levelDesign+GameDesign) and Kyllian Pires(Sound Design + GameDesign -> Instagram : @kyllian_pires)
